Ghimire This system is designed to be as minimal as possible, and have the tokens maintain a 1 token == 1$ peg. This stablecoin has the properties: - Exogenous Collateral - Dollar Pegged - Algorithmically Stable Our DSC system should be overcollateralized. At no point, should the value fo all collateranl <= the $ backed value of all the DSC.","kind":"dev","methods":{"depositCollateral(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amountCollateral":"The amount of collateral to deposit","tokenCollateralAddress":"The addrss of the token to deposit as collateral"}},"depositCollateralAndMintDSc(address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amountCollateral":"The amount of collateral to deposit","amountDscToMint":"The amount of DSC to mint","tokenCollateral":"The address of the token to deposit as collateral"}},"liquidate(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"collateral":"The erc20 address of the collateral to liquidate from the user","debtToCover":"The amount of DSC you want to burn to improve the users health factor","user":"The user who has broken the health factor. params.collateral: The erc20 address of the collateral to liquidate from the user
params.debtToCover: The amount of DSC you want to burn to improve the users health factor
params.user: The user who has broken the health factor. Their _healthFactor should be below MIN_HEALTH_FACTOR

depositCollateral(address,uint256).notice: follows CEI => checks, effects, interactions pattern

depositCollateralAndMintDSc(address,uint.notice: this function will deposit your collateral and mint DSC in one transaction.

liquidate(address,address,uint256).notice: You can partially liquidate a useryou will get a liquidation bonus for taking the users fundsThis function working assumes the protocol will be roughly 200% overcollateralized in order for this to work. user is undercollaterized, but protocol is overcollaterizedif the protocol is less than 100% or less collaterized, a bug is we won't be able to incentive the liquidators.Follows CEI

mintDsc(uint256).notice: follows CEI => checks, effects, interactions patternthey must have more collateral value more that the minimum threshold

redeemCollateralForDsc(address,uint256,u.notice: this function will burn DSC and redeem collateral in one transaction
